name: Into the darkness (Adam House)
description:
On your journey to the old village, you found an old rare flintlock pistol capable of firing shots each trigger pull and an old double-barreled shotgun that somehow still works and is extremely effective up close and possible. Despite already armed with an extremely accurate Assualt rifle, you take those two weapons and proceed on your mission, praying to return alive once completed the mission.

This is a short game designed by me to test fps mechanics I programmed such as ammo pickups, enemy AI that spots and attacks you on sight, torch use, and level design to make the village as Belavable and creepy as possible.

There is one easter egg in this game that references one of my characters from my previous games on my itch.io page, so good hunting!
